name: Gay Teen Movie Stills (Photo Exhibit)
description:
Did you ever feel like there were never enough gay teen movies when you were growing up?

This is 4 u

Virtual photography exhibit, collaboration with Rachael Heiman and Jade Cohen. Some of these feel still frames from some queer teen movie that was never made when I was a kid, others are more like behind the scenes shots. Music is "Ion" by Placebo, and one of the vinyl records features an album cover from the same band. I do not claim ownership of either of these, but all other art assets were made by me.
